description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer extensions (incorporating a juliet balcony) with 2 no. rooflights to front roofslope
decision_conditions: The proposed extensions and alterations are considered to fall within the parameters of  permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

In dealing with the application the Council has implemented the requirement in the National Planning Policy Framework to work with the applicant in a positive and proactive way.  We have made available detailed advice in the form or our statutory policies in the Core Strategy, Supplementary Planning Documents, Planning Briefs and other informal written guidance, as well as offering a full pre-application advice service, in order to ensure that the applicant has been given every opportunity to submit an application which is likely to be considered favourably. Officers have shared their concerns with the applicant over whether a Section 73 planning application is appropriate. Officers have accepted and considered a Counsel Opinion submitted by the applicant in response to this. However, the submitted Opinion does not address the fundamental concerns of the Local Planning Authority.
Plan Dimensions - please add all key dimensions to the plans.
